body:
Thanks for the reminder about the 2009 workshop.  I have been so  
swamped with other things, that I haven't had time for the usual  
website updates.  I'm not really the competent person to do those, but  
I'm the only one at the moment...


I'll also put the 4.0 distribution up on radiance-online, once I get  
the kinks out!


Cheers,
-Greg
